analysis.description:
TrivialToken.finishIco (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#293-317) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! artist.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#309-315)

ERC223Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#49) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#58-63)
empty in TrivialToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#82-83) is a local variable never initialiazed

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#4-5)
ERC223Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#49)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/21/0x158a96da5dcd1ade84ac11ac952683c0ee3516ab.sol#23) is not in mixedCase
